thread.title: Arsenal news: Martin Keown can't hide his excitement at Alexis Sanchez goal v Bayern Munich | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal news: Martin Keown can't hide his excitement at Alexis Sanchez goal v Bayern Munich | Metro News

author: George Bellshaw For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: Martin Keown can't hide his excitement at Alexis Sanchez goal v Bayern Munich | Metro News
text:
— BT Sport Football (@btsportfootball) February 15, 2017 
Martin Keown showed his true Arsenal colours as Alexis Sanchez fired home an equaliser against Bayern Munich. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The former centre-back was spending his evening working for BT Sport as a pundit alongside Manchester United hero Rio Ferdinand and Chelsea legend Michael Ballack. 
Things didn’t look great for Arsene Wenger’s side as Arjen Robben arrowed in a powerful strike from long range but they responded well and Sanchez levelled things up. 
After Robert Lewandowski kicked Laurent Koscielny to give Arsenal a penalty, Manuel Neuer saved Sanchez’s spot-kick, before the Chilean volleyed home from the rebound.
